Pinterest Marketing Automation

JARVEE’s ingenious growth tools will help you reach a whole new audience and speed up the growth of all your Pinterest accounts. Pinterest marketing automation can be easy and fun if you use the right tool – JARVEE!

JARVEE consistently delivers better visibility for your pins across all boards due to perfectly timed posting.

Schedule your Pins

Don’t just post hundreds of pins at a time. Instead spread them throughout the day to improve the chances of more people seeing them.
With JARVEE it’s easy to schedule your posts throughout the day.

Auto RePin

Find and autoamatically re-pin viral pins to your boards.
There are plenty search options, like based on keywords or specific boards or users.

Add Video Pins

Spice up your Pinterest accounts with video content. You can post Youtube or Vimeo videos and aply the same marketing techniques like you do for images.

Default URL

Set up a default URL to be added to all your pins so you can drive more traffic to your website.

Create Boards

Create as many boards you need for all your Pinterest accounts in one place, with JARVEE.

Auto Comment

Leave a thoughtful comment on niched pins to get yourself discovered by more people that might like what you have to offer. Get creative with spin syntax for more authenticity.

Auto-Follow

Find other users in your niche, or people that might be interested in your work and start following their activity. Pinterest marketing automation done right!

Follow Back

Stay in touch with your followers by following them back with JARVEE’s automation tools. This will build trust amongst your followers and help grow your business.

UnFollow

Follow only the people that are genuinely interested about your business and unfollow those that did not follow you back.

URL shortening

Create simple and clean messages by automatically shortening all your URLs in your posts with JARVEE.

Watermark your Pins

Protect your original work by adding a watermark before you publish it on Pinterest. This way every time someone re-pins your work, you will be recognized as the original author.

Add Pins from RSS

If you have a few amazing RSS feeds with great images you can add them to JARVEE and all the new images will be automatically pinned to your boards.

Monitor your Progress

JARVEE offers you a complete history and statistics data about your pins to analyze and use to improve your growth strategies.

Spin Syntax

Get creative with your messages and make them more unique with complex spin syntax techniques that are available throughout JARVEE platform.

Proxy Support

Make use of the JARVEE’s full proxy support and assign a HTTP proxy to each Pinterest account you manage.

Try JARVEE for FREE!

You can test JARVEE for 5 days for FREE and see for yourself why people are so addicted to it!
Pinterest marketing automation done the smart and easy way – try it today
Your time is more valuable than spending it on social media tasks that JARVEE can do 10 times better and faster.

Start Your Free Trial

Do you have a question? Contact us!

Send your questions via our contact form. But, before you do that, check out our Knowledge Base maybe your question is already answered.
